object.name: CondSummaryWord_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of CondSummary Word values
object.description: Distribution of condsumary word values. Values up to 33 are being displayed.

object.name: CondSummaryWord_Extended_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of CondSummary Word values
object.description: Distribution of condsumary word values. Values up to 250 are being displayed.

object.name: CondArrTKRTrigger_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival TKR triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for TKR triggers (nominally 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for TKR triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: CondArrCalLowTrigger_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival Cal-Low triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for Cal-Low triggers (nominally 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for Cal-Low triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: CondArrCalHiTrigger_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival Cal-Hi triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for Cal-Hi triggers (nominally 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for Cal-Hi triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: CondArrCNOTrigger_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival CNO triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for CNO triggers (nominally 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for CNO triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: CondArrROITrigger_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Condition arrival ROI triggers
object.axisdesc: [Condition arrival times for ROI triggers (nominally 50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Distribution of Condition arrival times for ROI triggers. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: DiscardedDelta_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of GEM discarded events between two successive read out events.
object.description: Number of GEM discarded events between two successive read out events. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: DeadZoneDelta_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of GEM deadzone events between two successive read out events.
object.description: Number of GEM deadzone events between two successive read out events. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: PrescaledDelta_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of GEM prescaled events between two successive read out events.
object.description: Number of GEM prescaled events between two successive read out events. Periodic triggers have been taken out.

object.name: TkrTrigger_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of tracker triggers per tower
object.description: Number of tracker triggers per tower

object.name: CalHiTrigger_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of Cal HI triggers per tower
object.description: Number of Cal HI triggers per tower

object.name: CalLoTrigger_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of Cal LOW triggers per tower
object.description: Number of Cal LOW triggers per tower

object.name: TkrTrigger_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of tracker triggers per tower
object.description: Number of tracker triggers per tower

object.name: CalHiTrigger_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of Cal HI triggers per tower
object.description: Number of Cal HI triggers per tower

object.name: CalLoTrigger_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of Cal LOW triggers per tower
object.description: Number of Cal LOW triggers per tower

object.name: DeltaWindowOpen_TH1
object.titledesc: GEM Delta window open time in milliseconds
object.description: GEM Delta window open time in milliseconds.

object.name: DeltaEventTime_TH1
object.titledesc: GEM Delta Event time in milliseconds
object.description: GEM Delta Event time in milliseconds.

object.name: DeltaWindowOpen_Zoom_TH1
object.titledesc: GEM Delta window open time in 50 ns ticks
object.description: Delta window open time as measured by the GEM in system clock ticks with a cut of 1500 ticks.

object.name: DeltaEventTime_Zoom_TH1
object.titledesc: GEM Delta Event time in 50 ns ticks
object.description: Delta event time as measured by the GEM in system clock ticks with a cut of 1500 ticks.

object.name: TimeLastDiscardedEvt_TH1
object.titledesc: Time of last discarded event in 50 ns ticks
object.axisdesc: [Time of last discarded event (50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Time between the previous read out event and the last discarded event in system clock ticks (nominally 50 ns). Only non-saturated values of the GEM time counters have been used.

object.name: TimeLastDiscardedEvt_Zoom_TH1
object.titledesc: Time of last discarded event in 50 ns ticks (ZOOM below 2000 ticks)
object.axisdesc: [Time of last discarded event (50 ns ticks), N]
object.description: Time between the previous read out event and the last discarded event in system clock ticks (nominally 50 ns). Only non-saturated values of the GEM time counters have been used. Only clock ticks up to 2000 are being displayed.

object.name: TriggerEngine_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Trigger Engines
object.description: Distribution of Trigger Engines.

object.name: DeltaEventTimeManual_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Delta Event Time computed manually
object.description: Distribution of Delta Event Time computed manually using the event time stamp.

object.name: DeltaEventTimeManual_Zoom_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Delta Event Time computed manually (ZOOM)
object.description: Distribution of Delta Event Time computed manually using the event time stamp. Only Delta times smaller than 0.4 ms are displayed.

object.name: Tick20MHzDeviation_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of ticks between successive 1-PPS
object.description: Number of ticks between successive 1-PPS - Deviation from 20 MHz.

object.name: Tick20MHzDeviation_Zoom_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of ticks between successive 1-PPS (ZOOM)
object.description: Number of ticks between successive 1-PPS - Deviation from 20 MHz. Only deviations smaller than 200 ticks are being displayed.

object.name: Tick20MHzDeviation_SuperZoom_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of ticks between successive 1-PPS (ZOOM)
object.description: Number of ticks between successive 1-PPS - Deviation from 20 MHz. Only deviations smaller than 200 ticks are being displayed.

object.name: CrateNumber_TH1
object.titledesc: Crate Number
object.description: Crate number (Epu0 - Epu1 - Epu2 - Siu0 - Siu1 - Aux); source from which this datagram comes from.

object.name: Delta_CCSDSTime_EvtTime_Epu0_TH1
object.titledesc: CCSDS time minus Evt time for EPU0
object.description: CCSDS Secondary Header time (digi->getCcsds().getUtc()) MINUS the evt time stamp (digi->getTimeStamp()) for events from EPU0.

object.name: Delta_CCSDSTime_EvtTime_Epu1_TH1
object.titledesc: CCSDS time minus Evt time for EPU1
object.description: CCSDS Secondary Header time (digi->getCcsds().getUtc()) MINUS the evt time stamp (digi->getTimeStamp()) for events from EPU1.

object.name: DeltaEvtID_Epu0_TH1
object.titledesc: Delta Evt ID for EPU0
object.description: Delta Evt ID (digi->getMetaEvent().scalers().sequence()) between consecutive events for EPU0.

object.name: DeltaEvtID_Epu1_TH1
object.titledesc: Delta Evt ID for EPU1
object.description: Delta Evt ID (digi->getMetaEvent().scalers().sequence()) between consecutive events for EPU1.

object.name: Acd_GemVeto_AcdTile_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of Acd Gem vetos by tile. Expect to see spikes at 15,31,47,63. These are the large tiles at the bottom of the sides of the ACD.
object.description: Number of Acd Gem vetos by tile. Expect to see spikes at 15,31,47,63. These are the large tiles at the bottom of the sides of the ACD.

object.name: AcdGemROI_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of Acd ROI by tower. This bit is set if any of the tile in the ROI fired a veto. This bit is independent of if the Tower bit is set.
object.description: Number of Acd ROI by tower. This bit is set if any of the tile in the ROI fired a veto. This bit is independent of if the Tower bit is set.

object.name: AcdGemCNO_GARC_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of Acd CNO by board. This bit is the OR of all the CNO signals on a single board. Because of the tile to board mapping, a factor two variation between boards is normal.
object.description: Number of Acd Cno by board. This bit is the OR of all the CNO signals on a single board. Because of the tile to board mapping, a factor two variation between boards is normal.

object.name: AcdDigis_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of ACD Digis per event
object.description: Distribution of ACD digis per event. This is just the total number of tiles that have at least one PMT above the zero suppression threshold.

object.name: AcdHitMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Hit Map
object.description: ACD Hit map: distribution of ACD GEM IDs for all Digis (hits)

object.name: AcdSingleHitMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Single Hit Map
object.description: ACD single hit map: distribution of ACD GEM IDs for all single hits

object.name: AcdVetoMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Veto Map
object.description: ACD Veto Map: distribution of ACD Vetos (produced by one or by the two PMTs).

object.name: AcdVetoAMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Veto Map from PMTA
object.description: ACD Veto Map from PMTA: distribution of ACD Vetos produced by PMT A.

object.name: AcdVetoBMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Veto Map from PMTB
object.description: ACD Veto Map from PMTB: distribution of ACD Vetos produced by PMT B.

object.name: AcdVetoA_DigiIdMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Veto Map from PMTA (Digi ID)
object.description: ACD Veto Map from PMTA using Digi ID: distribution of ACD Vetos produced by PMT A using the tile number provided by acdDigi->getId().getId().

object.name: AcdVetoB_DigiIdMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Veto Map from PMTB (Digi ID)
object.description: ACD Veto Map from PMTB using Digi ID: distribution of ACD Vetos produced by PMT B using the tile number provided by acdDigi->getId().getId().

object.name: AcdVetoA_And_B_DigiIdMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Veto Map for PMTA AND PMTB (Digi ID)
object.description: Distribution of ACD Vetos produced by PMT A And PMT B, using the tile number provided by acdDigi->getId().getId().

object.name: AcdVetoA_Or_B_DigiIdMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Veto Map for PMTA OR PMTB (Digi ID)
object.description: Distribution of ACD Vetos produced by PMT A OR PMT B, using the tile number provided by acdDigi->getId().getId().

object.name: AcdVetoA_And_NotB_DigiIdMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Veto Map for PMTA AND NOT PMTB (Digi ID)
object.description: Distribution of ACD Vetos produced by PMT A And NOT PMT B, using the tile number provided by acdDigi->getId().getId().

object.name: AcdVetoB_And_NotA_DigiIdMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Veto Map for PMTB AND NOT PMTB (Digi ID)
object.description: Distribution of ACD Vetos produced by PMT B And NOT PMT A, using the tile number provided by acdDigi->getId().getId().

object.name: AcdSingleVetoMap_TH1
object.titledesc: ACD Single Veto Map
object.description: ACD Single Veto Map: distribution of ACD Vetos (produced by one and only one PMT).

object.name: AcdPhaMap_PMTA_LowPMTRange_TH2
object.titledesc: ACD Pha Map PMT A (Low Range)
object.description: ACD Pha Map for PMT A. Only considered entries where the Low PMT range was used.

object.name: AcdPhaMap_PMTB_LowPMTRange_TH2
object.titledesc: ACD Pha Map PMT B (Low Range)
object.description: ACD Pha Map for PMT B. Only considered entries where the Low PMT range was used.

object.name: AcdPhaMap_PMTA_HighPMTRange_TH2
object.titledesc: ACD Pha Map PMT A (High Range)
object.description: ACD Pha Map for PMT A. Only considered entries where the High PMT range was used.

object.name: AcdPhaMap_PMTB_HighPMTRange_TH2
object.titledesc: ACD Pha Map PMT B (High Range)
object.description: ACD Pha Map for PMT B. Only considered entries where the High PMT range was used.

object.name: AcdHitMap_GafeGarc_TH2
object.titledesc: ACD Hit Map Garc:Gafe
object.description: ACD Hit Map Garc:Gafe.

object.name: AcdVetoMap_GafeGarc_TH2
object.titledesc: ACD Veto Map Garc:Gafe
object.description: ACD Veto Map Garc:Gafe.

object.name: TkrHits_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of strip hits per event (all towers included).
object.description: Distribution of the number of strip hits per event (all towers included).

object.name: TkrHits_TH1_Tower[16]
object.description: Distribution of the number of strip hits per tower.

object.name: TkrPlanesHit_TH1_Tower[16]
object.description: Distribution of the number of planes hit in a tower.

object.name: TkrHitsCounter_TowerPlane_TH2
object.titledesc: Number of strip hits vs Tower and Tkr plane.
object.description: Number of strip hits vs Tower and Tkr plane.

object.name: ZeroTkrHitsCounter_TowerPlane_TH2
object.titledesc: Counter for ZERO strip hits vs Tower and Tracker plane.
object.description: Counter for ZERO strip hits vs Tower and Tracker plane.

object.name: HitsInEmptyTower_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of hits when the tower was empty vs tower number
object.description: Number of hits when the tower was empty vs tower number

object.name: TkrDigiCounter_TowerPlane_TH2
object.titledesc: Number of TkrDigi objects in each vs Tower and Tracker plane.
object.description: Number of TkrDigi objects in each vs Tower and Tracker plane.

object.name: TkrDigiCounter_Tower_TH1
object.titledesc: Number of TkrDigi objects vs tower number
object.description: Number of TkrDigi objects vs tower number.

object.name: TkrDigis_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of tracker Digis per event (all towers included).
object.description: Distribution of the number of TkrDigis per event (all towers included).

object.name: ToT_0_WhenTkrHitsExist_TowerPlane_TH2
object.titledesc: Number of times that, existing TkrDigi and having at least one hit, ToT==0 in both controller 0 and controller 1 in [tower][trkplane]
object.description: Number of times that, existing TkrDigi and having at least one hit, ToT==0 in both controller 0 and controller 1 in [tower][trkplane]

object.name: CalXHit_NHit_Counter_TowerCalLayer_TH2
object.titledesc: Number of hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.
object.description: Number of hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: ZeroCalXHit_NHit_Counter_TowerCalLayer_TH2
object.titledesc: Number of times there is ZERO hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.
object.description: Number of times there is ZERO hits in a calorimeter layer defined by the coordinates tower,callayer. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.

object.name: CalX_NHit_TH1_Tower[16]
object.axisdesc: [Number of CalX_Hits in this tower, N]
object.description: Distribution of Cal crystals hits per event in this tower.

object.name: CalX_Total_NHit_TH1
object.titledesc: Distribution of Cal crystals hits per event (all towers included).
object.description: Distribution of Cal crystals hits per event (all towers included).

object.name: CalXReadoutRange_TH2
object.titledesc: Cal readout range used vs cal channel. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.
object.description: Cal readout range used vs cal channel. Periodic triggers are NOT taken into account.
